title: 3 bedroom 2 bathroom condo rental
description:
Great one floor living. This unit is the largest in the development. A corner unit. When you enter the condo you have a large closet one one side and another large closet with the laundry with washer and dryer included. An open concept kitchen with generous kitchen cabinets, a reverse osmosis water filter in kitchen, an island for extra counter space or for dining, dining and living room flow together. All freshly painted with laminate flooring. There is a Master bedroom and master bath with a wall of closets. A second bedroom with two closets, also den or small bedroom with sliders to the balcony. There is a separate study for your desk and paperwork. Outside the office there is a bank of hutch style closets. Don't miss this rental!
No pets. No smoking.
The apartment building overlooks the Schuylkill river and Schulykill bike path.
Owner pays association fees while tenant pays electric, internet, and cable.

title: Luxury 2BD/2Bath Logan Square apartment
description:
1,209 sq ft 2 bedroom 2 bathroom 1st-floor corner unit for $2,981/month at the Edgewater Apartments.  The community has a gym, club room, business center, courtyard w/ grills, kids playroom, dog park, and a pool coming soon.  Greenfield catchment for school-age kids, adjacent Schuylkill River trail access, and short walks to GIANT, Trader Joes, subways, and regional rail.
We are looking for someone to take over our lease beginning October 1, 2022. The current rent is $2,981/month and this will be the base for any renewal increase once the lease is transferred to you. Rent is locked-in through April 6, 2023. Similar units are currently renting for about $3,349/month.

- The unit is fully carpeted, except for the kitchen and bathrooms.

- Main bedroom has a walk-in closet, and main bathroom has two sinks
- Washer & Dryer in unit
- Floor plan is here: https://edgewaterapthomes.com/assets/files/M2.pdf
- Attached parking or Unattached parking tower available (not included)
Please contact current residents Tomo & Kay via email.

This is a beautiful newly renovated two bedroom apartment with a large professionally landscaped garden and private laundry room in a classic West Philly Victorian house. This sunny apartment has large windows on three sides providing natural light from southern and western exposures. There is an open kitchen and dining area with access to the backyard, a large bedroom with a bay window and lots of closet space, a fully renovated brand new marble tiled bathroom, living room and second bedroom. The kitchen has a new stainless steel dishwasher and refrigerator, large gas range, quartz countertops and zero radius sink. The apartment has both hot water radiator heat and HVAC heat and air conditioning. This is a great West Philly location, just off Baltimore Avenue and within a couple blocks of the Gold Standard Cafe, Vietnam Restaurant, Dock Street Brewing, Little Baby's Ice Cream and the Mariposa Food Co-Op, Loco Pez, and much more. Street parking is plentiful as is public transportation. The trolley runs along Baltimore Ave. which also has bike lanes running both directions into Center City. title: High-end newly renovated 2-bed with landscaped garden, HVAC, laundry
description:
Beautifully Renovated large 2-Bed w/ laundry and high-end finishes
Property Address
813 S 49th St | Apt 1 | Philadelphia, PA 19143
Available: 08/01/2022
Offered By
Brighton House |  show contact info
Description
813 S 49th St. Apt #1
Available: August 1st
This is a large two bedroom apartment with private garden in a completely renovated apartment building with close attention to detail and design. The unit occupies the entire first floor with additional basement storage and laundry in unit. This apartment has a beautiful open layout that's perfect for entertaining with a kitchen that opens onto the back deck. Exposed brick, bleached wide plank hardwood floors, and lots of light everywhere. There is dimmable recessed lighting in every room. The kitchen has white marble counters, subway tile backsplash, custom inset cabinetry with soft close doors and drawers, unlacquered brass pulls and knobs, zero radius sink, under cabinet lighting and high-end stainless steel appliances with a vented range hood and Bosch dishwasher. There is a large eat-at kitchen island that's open to the expansive living space. The main bedroom has two large closets and stunning en-suite bathroom with freestanding clawfoot bathtub. The bathrooms are completely new with marble tile floors, wainscoting, subway tile showers, a large marble topped double vanity, and unlacquered brass fixtures, including exposed thermostatic showers. The second bedroom overlooks the back garden.
The building has just been renovated top to bottom with new plumbing and electric, totally new kitchens, baths, and HVAC systems with Nest thermostats. It sits on the corner of 49th and Beaumont; one of West Philly's beautiful garden blocks with great neighbors.
The location is perfect. Just south of Baltimore Ave. on a beautiful garden block, just steps from Mariposa Food Co-op, Little Baby's Ice Cream, Gold Standard Cafe, Dock Street Brewing, Loco Pez, Bookers, Greensgrow, Cedar Park and so much more. Commuting is easy with on street parking, bike lanes everywhere, a trolly line on Baltimore Ave that's minutes to the heart of Center City, and garden lined sidewalks shaded by 100 year old trees.
Tenant pays gas and electric. Landlord pays water, hot water, and trash collection. Last month and security deposit due at signing. Pets are welcome with pet rent. No smoking. Screening criteria include application, proof of income, credit score, and criminal background check.

title: the finest level of detail
description:
Introducing two six two four, a bespoke build tailored to the finest level of detail, optimally located just above the iconic philadelphia museum of art, in philadelphia's esteemed fairmount neighborhood. This sun-soaked and stately 4bd x 3.5ba 3200 sf corner residence is equipped with a stunningly modern gourmet kitchen featuring custom mid-continent cabinetry, caesarstone cloudburst concrete quartz counters and backsplash, deluxe lg appliances, picture windows and dedicated workstation. Two six two four also features a sunken living and dining lounge; multiple outdoor spaces; powder room with pocket door and graham & brown wallpaper; led vanity mirrors throughout; dedicated home office with southern-facing museum vistas through french doors; dedicated high-tech fitness studio with tonal smart home gym; full floor primary suite; wet bar with matching kitchen finishes; custom closets in every bedroom; wide plank oak hardwood flooring throughout; soaring ceiling heights of up to 11+ feet; a fully-finished lower level complete with a full bathroom and in-law suite + storage; custom wainscoting in each of the upper-floor bedrooms; dual-zone high powered hvac with nest thermostat; matte black and brushed gold plumbing fixtures; custom railings throughout; and all of the perks of contemporary new construction luxury living (built 2019, refurbished 2022). Each level of the house is spatially maximized to take advantage of the natural light emanating throughout the dramatic corner property with 3 exposures (south, north, east). A rear garden off of the kitchen with seasonal planters and turf provides a quaint green space retreat and is ideal for light gardening. The 2nd-storey sun terrace lends itself perfectly to year-round outdoor entertaining and decompression. Savor the philly skyline and museum vistas â€“ especially during sunrise and sunset hours, as the hilltop corner setting overlooks the fairmount neighborhood including fairmount park to the west. And the juliet balcony off the primary suite provides an inspirational perspective from high above the city. Professionally designed and managed landscaping features include custom planters and window boxes around the perimeter of the property which are automatically controlled by an irrigation system for maintenance-free greenery and beauty throughout all 4 pennsylvania seasons, complementing the lush natural surrounds of fairmount park. The handsomely striking white brick exterior is checkered with dozens of oversized pella casement energy efficient windows. The substantial curb appeal is immediately noticeable from the property's commanding corner presence at the intersection of brown and taney streets. Coveted and convenient 1-car secure garage parking is included in the sale at the wagonworks building next door (prepaid for 3 years). The location is walkable to many of philly's most desirable amenities and attractions including boathouse row, philadelphia museum of art, fairmount park, schuylkill river trail, whole foods, center city (downtown), fairmount avenue commercial corridor and more. Neighborhood favorites brown street cafe, musette cafe and black sheep pub are a short stroll away, as well as a popular community dog park and playground overlooking kelly drive and the art museum. This distinguished residence offers incomparable value and comfort with first-class construction, supreme location, inspired interiors, enduring architecture and uplifting city views. Developed by hudson james homes and designed by ambit architecture - two leading philadelphia firms. The property is also available for sale.
2624 brown st

The shopping plaza features zahav restaurant (previously named best u.S. Restaurant), sue's produce food market and a cleaners. title: Offering studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments
description:
Offering studio, 1 & 2 bedroom apartments. Center city philadelphia apartments near rittenhouse square be a part of history! Icon mixes the beauty of the past with the modern amenities of today. Included on theã‚â national register of historic places this incredible rental building soars to new heights, just like its iconic, ziggurat-topped peak. Looking for a downtown philadelphia apartment nearã‚â rittenhouse square? You've found it! Icon is the most exciting rental property to ever grace rittenhouse square. A quintessential example of the art deco exuberance that defined the 1920s and 30s, icon's design is inspired by art deco's geometric shapes and today's streamlined lifestyle. With this historic luxury building, you can be within steps of all the fine dining, high-end retail and cultural offerings that philadelphia has to offer. The most fashionable edifice of its day, icon is as rich in history as it is in beauty. Opened in 1930, at the beginning of the great depression, the building's ground floor tenants included both cunard's white star line and the united states lines, and the esteemed pew family maintained a pied-a-terre on the 25th floor. Today, this history echoes throughout icon, a building that is a rare architectural experience. The lobby is so stunning it will make you stop in your tracks, with its art deco-styled elevators, glazed black brick and grey porcelain flooring and a cast-bronze portal. And the residences feature the kind of classic fixtures, state-of-the-art appliances and iconic details that can only be found in a landmark building. Apartment amenities: kitchen features include sleek high gloss white cabinets with soft close drawers and doors.Ã‚â stainless steel appliances, including a glass top electric range and microwave. Glass-tile, kitchen backsplash. Quartz top kitchen island. Engineered hardwood flooring. Baths with sleek, high gloss cabinets and quartz countertops, glazed 12x12 porcelain tile. Air conditioning. Carpeting in bedrooms. Washer and dryer. Amazing views of philadelphia. Enhanced penthouse level finish on 23/24 floors. Venetian medicine cabinet. Wheelchair accessible apartments available. 2 inch wood window blinds. Community amenities: sky deck with 360 view, includes grilling station and outdoor living area with fireplaceâ . Wellness floor featuring a yoga studio, cardio, weights, trx & boxingâ . Private dining room with fireplace and serving kitchen. Club level with kitchen, billiards, flat-screen tvs and large screen. Media room for private parties. Business center with computers, printers, conference rooms with a/v capabilities. Media roomã‚â . Full service concierge. Parking garage w/ valet parking option. Package receiving. Pet grooming station. On site property management. Elevator. Charging stations for electric cars. Cold storage for grocery delivery. 24 hour emergency maintenance. Pets welcome: $500 one-time fee. Max 2 pets per home. $35 / month pet rent. On-site green drop donation box. ** pricing and availability subject to change on a daily basis ** photos are of model units ** parking may be available for additional fee **

title: Secure, oversized garage parking included!
description:
Secure, oversized garage parking included! Welcome to 1815 wylie #a, a newer-construction bi-level condo in the heart of it all. Enter through the main level, a sun-filled space with 9-foot ceilings and gleaming bamboo floors. This floor includes a chef’s kitchen with quartz countertops and a center island. The open floor plan is flexible for dining and entertaining, and features a stone wall with inset gas fireplace. Continue through sliding glass doors to a rear private patio, perfect for all your summer evening plans. Completing the first floor is a light-drenched bedroom with walk-in closet, and a modern hall bathroom. When you’re ready for a retreat, the lower level floor offers a living space perfect for your home theater or gym. The primary bedroom suite is located at the rear of the unit, offering quiet privacy, abundant closet space, and a large ensuite bathroom with walk-in shower. Lower level also features a laundry room and second outdoor patio. This francisville find is close to all restaurants and attractions fairmount avenue has offer, including bar hygge, eastern state penitentiary, and the met philadelphia. Resident garage allows secure walking access from parking spot to back door.

title: Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House! Available Aug
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent! Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurants.

title: New fitness center, Beautiful courtyards, Elevator building
description:
Korman Residential on the Main Line are beautiful apartments in Haverford, PA. We offer unique, spacious floor plan options, and whether you are looking for a MicroSuite, studio, or one-bedroom apartment, each of our rentals has hardwood floors and walk-in closets. The kitchens have fabulous cabinets and countertops with built-in appliances. You’ll love the exceptional curbside appeal. Built in 1926, and once a hotel named Casa Del Sol, our building is listed on the National Historic Register. title: Luxury 3BD/3Bath New Construction House! Available August 2022
description:
Newly constructed spacious house for rent!  Special attention has been given to each and every detail in the building of this state-of-the-art home. Located in the Grays Ferry section of South Philadelphia, in close proximity to University of Pennsylvania, High way I-76 and the retail corridor, this home is surrounded by numerous new constructions and recent rehab projects.
This gorgeous home has 3 bedrooms with 3 custom bathrooms. The home boasts hardwood flooring, recessed lighting, low VOC paint throughout the house, smoke/carbon monoxide detectors, fire-sprinkler system, and is also cable ready. Enter the home to be greeted by a well-lit and spacious grand living room. Past the sun-lit grand living room you will find your state-of-the-art open galley kitchen. The beautifully appointed kitchen is outfitted with soft-close cabinets, modern Quartz counter-tops, contemporary backsplash, deep sink with chef's faucet, SS Samsung appliance package (dishwasher, fridge, range, microwave), and under cabinet lighting. From the kitchen via you will find the entrance to your private backyard. From the first floor, commercial grade Pine staircases (secured by custom railing) lead you up to the 2nd level of the house. Here the home presents a large room with a spacious organized closet, a huge bathroom with a custom vanity set, and laundry room. Following the staircase to the 3rd level, you enter to your own private oasis. The 3rd floor has another large bedroom, custom spa-like bathroom, and a spacious closet! The master bath boasts custom tile-work, dual vanity set, soaking tub and a designer rainfall shower. Take another step up the stairs to the pilot-house where you will find the access to your private dual rooftop decks. The home has electric and water lines on the rooftop, making it an ideal area to host parties and get-togethers. The finished basement offers another spacious bedroom or home office, custom full bathroom, and utility closet.
Extra included bonuses: Large High Energy Efficient windows, Built-in (Bluetooth enabled) speakers in living room & master bedroom, energy efficient DUAL zoned HVAC, organized closet shelving system, Nest camera in front and rear of home, Schlage keyless door lock in front, LED recessed lighting, digital thermostats, and much more! MUST SEE! Home has approximately 1850 SqFt of living space. Located close to public transportation, highway, nightlife, grocery stores, and restaurant.
Come see this perfect home today!

description:

You can enter the house from the front or the back after you park your car in the garage.
